titles.title: Homefront Heroes Helping Frontline Families Tax Relief Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a credit for providing volunteer service to military families through the America Supports You program of the Department of Defense.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/14/2008--Introduced. Homefront Heroes Helping Frontline Families Tax Relief Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax credit of up to $500 for volunteer services provided to military families through the America Supports You program of the Department of Defense.
